note: Schema for the chiral index / family-number mechanism sketched in paper_v1_06_01_09_2025.tex (Appendix J): orientable double cover of Möbius fiber with three effective boundary cycles C1,C2,CT; integer fluxes/holonomies νi yield Ind D = ν1+ν2+νT. Wilson lines along cycles can encode discrete phases without breaking the 4D gauge group.

u1_convention.name: SM hypercharge Y
u1_convention.definition: Q = T3 + Y (SM convention; NOT GUT-normalized g1_GUT)
u1_convention.wilson_line_holonomy_model: For a U(1) connection A with ∮_Ci A = 2π νi, a field of charge Y picks up phase exp(i·Y·∮A) = exp(i·2π·Y·νi).
